msg
Homu is famous worldwide. A comic book called "Homu's adventure". Many readers love it very much!
吼姆可是这个世界上最受欢迎的角色，出自漫画《吼姆大冒险》。这部漫画至今已经连载了327回，共出了52卷单行本，拥有着庞大的读者群，至少占据了全人类的60%。
ホムは、漫画「ホムの大冒険」に登場するキャラクターです。地球上で最も人気のあるキャラと言っても過言ではありません。読者数は人類の60%以上、連載は327回を迎え、単行本は52巻まで発売されています。
홈은 만화 「홈의 대모험」에 등장하는 캐릭터입니다. 지구상에서 가장 인기 있는 캐릭터라고 해도 과언이 아닙니다. 독자 수는 인류의 60% 이상, 연재는 327회를 맞이했으며, 단행본은 52권까지 발매되었습니다.

Homu is a character that appears in the manga "Homu's Great Adventure." It's no exaggeration to say that he is the most popular character on Earth. It has over 60% of the world's readership, has been serialized for 327 episodes, and there are 52 published volumes.

Howlam is the most popular character in the world, from the manga "Howlam Adventure". This manga has been serialized 327 times, a total of 52 volumes of single-volume, with a huge readership, occupying at least 60% of the human race.

Hom is a character from the comic strip "Hom's Great Adventure". He is arguably the most popular character on the planet. He has a readership of more than 60% of humanity, has been serialized 327 times, and has been published in 52 book volumes.
